front.title: •Zuckuss' Snare Rifle
front.gametext: Deploy on Zuckuss, or use 1 Force to deploy on any other bounty hunter. May target a character or creature using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Character captured if destiny -1 > defense value. Creature lost if destiny +1 > defense value.
front.lore: Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc. GRS-1 Snare Rifle. Shoots liquefied shockstun mist up to 150 meters. Liquid spraynet Hardens into a translucent web, confining the stunned target.
